answerText: tropopause[10] Upper level divergences and convergences in the troposphere can be produced by these wind patterns which are a major component of the Ferrel circulation and result when cold, polar air moving towards the equator meets warm tropical air.

subject: Science
question: Question: A process in which the convergence into a column of air is offset by divergence elsewhere occurs between this layer of the atmosphere andthe surface and is known as Dines compensation.  [10] Identify this atmospheric layer, which is low in the subtropical and polar jet fronts, and which forms the bottom boundary of the stratosphere.
